review: I gave my Roku to my son, so I got this for me.  This is a little quirky compared to Roku (although I've been watching Roku for a couple years, and like most people do not embrace change all that well).  It works fine, and you can get to where you're going, and it's maybe even better for Amazon prime video (no surprise since it's an amazon fire tv stick), but slightly more difficult to get to Netflix (which is where I spend half my time when watching streaming tv). On the plus side, it goes into stand-by mode and flips thru an amazing set of photos (from amazon), really beautiful photos-sometimes we just sit and watch those for 5 minutes, and also good for my plasma tv which doesnt like to be kept on the same screen for too long or it will "burn-in".  Overall, quite good but a star off for a little more difficulty to get to Netflix and the other little quirks.
